resources.string: Applies the given function on the main thread to each value emitted by source LiveData and returns LiveData, which emits resulting values.

Creates a LiveData, let\'s name it swLiveData, which follows next flow: it reacts on changes of trigger LiveData, applies the given function to new value of trigger LiveData and sets resulting LiveData as a backing LiveData to swLiveData
To implement your own transformation you can you use the MediatorLiveData class, which listens to other LiveData objects and processes events emitted by them.
